sentences.en: For the next three years they corresponded regularly.
sentences.cn: 在接下来的三年里他们经常通信。

sentences.en: Her expression is concerned but her body-language does not correspond.
sentences.cn: 她满脸关切之情，但她的肢体语言并非如此。

sentences.en: His expenses do not correspond to his income.
I assure you my actions will correspond with my words.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证,我将言行一致.

sentences.en: I should never correspond to your pattern of a lady.
sentences.cn: 你为小姐们制定的规格我永远达不到.

sentences.en: If we find they correspond, every fear of mine will be removed.
sentences.cn: 如果我们发现他们通信的话, 我的种种忧虑就会烟消云散了.

sentences.en: The arms of a man correspond to the wings of a bird.
sentences.cn: 人的手臂相当于鸟的翅膀.

sentences.en: The French ‘baccalaureate’ exam roughly corresponds to English A levels.
sentences.cn: 法国的毕业会考大致相当于英国的高级程度考试。

sentences.en: The last two integrals correspond to the natural boundary conditions.
sentences.cn: 最后两个积分对应于自然边界条件.

sentences.en: The question arises here; does initiation correspond to pre - neoplasia?
sentences.cn: 问题从这里提出: “始发阶段”是否相当于瘤前病变?

sentences.en: The translation does not quite correspond to the original.
The two halves of the document did not correspond.
sentences.cn: 这份文件的前后两部分不相符。

sentences.en: The two maps of London correspond closely.
sentences.cn: 这两张伦敦地图很相似。

sentences.en: The two sisters correspond every week.
There were two bedrooms to correspond with the rooms downstairs.
sentences.cn: 楼上有两间与楼下相仿的房间.

sentences.en: These goods do not correspond with the list.
These wave functions correspond to states of constant energy E.
sentences.cn: 这些波函数对应于具有恒定能量E的态.

sentences.en: Your account of events does not correspond with hers.
sentences.cn: 你对事情的陈述与她说的不相符。

words.tran_cn: 相当的，相应的；一致的；通信的
通讯记者；客户；通信者；代理商行

trans.tran_en: if two things or ideas correspond, the parts or information in one relate to the parts or information in the other

trans.tran_cn: 相符合， 相一致； 相当， 相类似； 通信
trans.tran_en: if two things or ideas correspond, the parts or information in one relate to the parts or information in the other
